text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Nice job, Brian.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I still couldn't bring back a first-place<n>finish.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: You gave it everything you had<n>though. It was a good race.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: You gave it everything you had<n>though. It was a good race.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Trainer...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I have to tell you something... It's<n>about me, I can't...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: You can't run with your old form...<n>Right?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: You can't run with your old form...<n>Right?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...You noticed?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Not until your race just now. I saw it<n>in how hard you
fought.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Not until your race just now. I saw it<n>in how hard you
fought.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Even I'm not sure what's wrong<n>with it.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Just... something feels off when I try.<n>It doesn't work the
way it did before.

While the injury healed, it must have<n>changed Brian's body
in small<n>ways—a little shift to her balance, a<n>slightly
different sensation in her leg.

Combined, the changes impacted her<n>form enough to snatch
away the<n>running style Brian spent so long<n>perfecting. It's
soul-crushing...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I should've told you. But I thought if I<n>did, you'd make me
quit.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I might have.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I might have.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
But things are different now. Even if<n>you can't run like
before, you haven't<n>changed.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
But things are different now. Even if<n>you can't run like
before, you haven't<n>changed.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
You want to win so badly, you'll push<n>through anything. The
Narita Brian who<n>first captivated me is still right here.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
You want to win so badly, you'll push<n>through anything. The
Narita Brian who<n>first captivated me is still right here.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: It's like Sis said—you really do put<n>your racers first.
choice_data_list: I'm with you to the end!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Good... Then I'll keep on running!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Brian's next race is the Hanshin<n>Daishoten. But how do we
get her to<n>victory?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ah, so this's where you've been! I<n>finished warming up!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Oh, sorry. I was thinking about what<n>to do for Brian's
training.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
I need to figure out a completely new<n>way of running for her
that can draw<n>out all her power.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hmm... That sounds way too<n>complicated for me.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
There's no time for trial and error, so<n>I was wondering how
we could train<n>smarter.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
There's no time for trial and error, so<n>I was wondering how
we could train<n>smarter.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Ummm, arrrrgh... Yeah, smarter, but...<n>Argh, I wish I had the
smarts to think<n>smaaarteeer!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I thought it was you, Ticket. I could<n>hear your voice from a
furlong away.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Aaah! Here we go, Trainer! Someone<n>with a big head FULL
of smarts!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Hey! I keep telling you my head isnot big... Wait, what are youtalking about?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Right, an intellect like hers might be<n>perfect!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Wait, what is this all about?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
You guys sure are lively. I heard<n>Brian's next race is set, so
I made<n>some rice balls to give her a boost.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Wow! Now we've even got a running<n>partner!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Wow! Now we've even got a running<n>partner!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Huh? You wanna go one-on-one or<n>somethin'?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Sis and... Ama?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
I asked Hayahide to help brainstorm<n>new training and
running styles that'd<n>suit you now.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
And to test them out, we figured the<n>best running partner
would be<n>someone you've raced before!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
And to test them out, we figured the<n>best running partner
would be<n>someone you've raced before!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Hehe, that's right. Just let ol'<n>Hishiama fix what ails!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
A by-the-numbers approach may not<n>be the best for a
natural-born runner<n>such as yourself, but I'm sure it'll<n>
prove more beneficial than running<n>blindly.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I'd hate to lose our little sibling rivalry,<n>so we must get you
back to your old<n>self—no, we must make you better<n>than
ever before.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Heh, I'll take whatever scraps I can.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: All right! Time to carve a path to<n>victory!

text_block_list.name: Everyone
text_block_list.text: Yeah!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: I took a peek at Hayahide's trainingplans for you and man. A monthof that, and your quads will be JACKED!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, she always takes things too<n>seriously, including
training. No wonder<n>her regimen is so effective.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: You must be proud to be her sister.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: You must be proud to be her sister.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I am.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
You two may be different, but you<n>know each other's racing
styles so<n>well and were both Racers of the<n>Year. You're
indispensable to one<n>another.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Oh, right! They're gonna announce<n>the URA awards soon,
huh?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: It should be on TV. I'll turn it on.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: It should be on TV. I'll turn it on.

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
This racer topped Narita Brian's<n>record at the Kikuka Sho
and went on<n>to win the Arima Kinen!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
Her sky-high success can't be<n>stopped, so that's why
Mayano Top<n>Gun has been chosen as Racer of the<n>Year!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Oh, uh, thank you very much!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
Everyone knows you had a fantastic<n>year, but what are
your hopes for<n>what comes next?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
My hopes are the same as everyone<n>watching—to give an
ace performance<n>in a mach-speed race!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Then we'll know to keep expecting<n>big things out of you.

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
Now, are there any opponents out<n>there that get you excited
to race?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Yes! Uh-huh! There is! Someone just<n>like that!
